description: So... Where do I put a link to this page?  It's an important thing for new players to see, but there isn't really a good place to put it.

replies.body: No clue but I'd say the thing is a little bit too rough (and mistake-ridden) to really be given too much publicity yet. I'm a tad bit busy at the moment but I should be able to beat it into decent state over the weekend.
